content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":27227,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/91024a8b-77cb-4ed1-8586-dd43fbf22fbb/Estee Lauder companies.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/91024a8b-77cb-4ed1-8586-dd43fbf22fbb/Estee Lauder companies.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Estee Lauder companies.PNG\",\"name\":\"Estee Lauder companies.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"91024a8b-77cb-4ed1-8586-dd43fbf22fbb\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":803,\"height\":406},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"American multinational manufacturer and marketer of skincare, makeup, fragrance and hair care products, based in New York City. The company owns a diverse portfolio of brands, distributed internationally through both digital commerce and retail channels. 2020 revenue was $14.3B.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is engaged with multiple stakeholder groups including IT / Architecture / Engineering, Data & Analytics, Consumer Marketing / Retail, and Travel Retail teams. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Since 2017 EPAM has successfully grown the account from a small group of developers to a team of ~300 engineers, designers and consultants driving some of ELCâ€™s most important initiatives. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
